ComicInfo.Summary: Killer in Me, Killer in You; (Sanctuary Book Five: The Wolf - Chapter Four): Lusiphur finds Edmund C. Kemper, one of the Blood Guard who incidentally is also the serial killer who's been killing prostitutes in Mandratha. In return for listening to his story, Lusiphur receives what he wants: where they're keeping Jace.
